text: TSMC manufactures advanced semiconductors for global clients including Apple, AMD, NVIDIA, and Qualcomm.
ASML builds EUV lithography systems used by leading chipmakers such as TSMC, Samsung, and Intel.
NVIDIA designs GPUs and AI accelerators widely used in cloud and enterprise AI; it partners with TSMC and leading hyperscalers.
Microsoft offers the Azure cloud platform and partners with OpenAI; its investments span AI, cloud, and productivity software.
OpenAI develops frontier AI systems including ChatGPT and integrates with partners like Microsoft and NVIDIA.
Apple builds iPhone and other consumer devices, outsourcing manufacturing to partners like TSMC and Foxconn.
